faqs.q: How fast can I get matched with a landscaping specialist?
faqs.a: Most projects receive introductions to 2-3 vetted landscape teams within 24 hours. Larger design-build scopes may include a discovery call first to align budgets and timelines.

faqs.q: Do you support NGBS or LEED-aligned outdoor projects?
faqs.a: Yes. We maintain a roster of certified sustainable designers and installers experienced with LEED for Homes, SITES, and National Green Building Standard requirements.
